text:
Ben Black


Doctoral Researcher


      




Hi there!

I’m Ben, a PhD student currently working within the ValPar.CH project as part of the research group Planning of Landscape Urban Systems (PLUS) at ETH Zürich.
I’m a BIG fan of R stats for everything research related particularly for promoting open science and reproducibility. I started this site/blog to share some of my work that doesn’t necessarily make it into publications in the hope that others will find it useful. Thanks for stopping by!  


Experience





Student Affairs Manager, 2018


The School for Field Studies Center for Conservation and Development Studies in the Lower Mekong

Elephant Livelihood Initiatives and Environment (E.L.I.E)
